Siege of Rochelle (arr. Sutton)
Victoria Park, Salisbury, Wiltshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £6 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £3, 4th £2. March contest - 1st Odstock, 2nd Broadchalke, 3rd tied - Bourton and South of England Temp. Best trombone - Berwick St John. Best euphonium - Fovant. 7 bands competed.
